memberdef.name: updateKurgYGPU

briefdescription.para: CUDA kernel for updating Y-direction fluxes using the Kurganov scheme.

detaileddescription.para: Computes fluxes and time step constraints for each cell in the Y direction (based on kurganov and Petrova 2007).

sect4.title: Topographic source term
sect4.para: In the case of adaptive refinement, care must be taken to ensure well-balancing at coarse/fine faces (see [notes/balanced.tm]()).

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< float > XBlock, EvolvingP< float > XEv, GradientsP< float > XGrad, FluxP< float > XFlux, float *dtmax, float *zb)
memberdef.name: updateKurgYGPU< float >

memberdef.name: KurgSolver

briefdescription.para: Kurganov-Petrova approximate Riemann solver for fluxes and time step.

detaileddescription.para: Computes fluxes and time step for the Kurganov scheme given left/right states and velocities (based on kurganov and Petrova 2007).
